com.sana.android.plugin.hardware

Class CaptureSetting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sana.android.plugin.hardware.CaptureSetting

  • public class CaptureSetting
extends java.lang.Object
    You should add your the capture setting required by your sensor. The setter should return this instance. See the existing methods for reference.
